name: Hub Tag Add-ons Elementor
author: CodeCares

sections.description:
Hub Tag Add-ons for Elementor features huge collection of premium, easy to use yet highly functional extensions that can be used in an Elementor page builder. This is really a premium plugin that you can get for free. Now, we are relished a slick slider features for free. Upcoming, premium features are coming soon.

Features –

1.  You can add also video background (Youtube, Vimeo). 
    Auto play, Auto plays Speed, Infinite Loop

2.  There are 3 types of slider. 
    Single item, Multiple Item, Center Mode

3.  You can change also in navigation 
    Arrows and Dots, Dots, None

4.  Add Content animation. 

5.  All Devices Responsive Supported.
